author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...ERICK FORECAST TO BRING HURRICANE CONDITIONS AND LIFE-THREATENING FLASH FLOODS TO PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN MEXICO LATER TONIGHT AND THURSDAY...
summary: ...ERICK FORECAST TO BRING HURRICANE CONDITIONS AND LIFE-THREATENING FLASH FLOODS TO PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN MEXICO LATER TONIGHT AND THURSDAY... As of 12:00 AM CST Wed Jun 18 the center of Erick was located near 13.1, -95.1 with movement NW at 7 mph. The minimum central pressure was 998 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...ERICK FORECAST TO BRING HURRICANE CONDITIONS AND LIFE-THREATENING FLASH FLOODS TO PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN MEXICO LATER TONIGHT AND THURSDAY... title: Summary for Tropical Storm Erick (EP5/EP052025)
